Daily Prayer Guide

Physical Strength

Lord, grant us the strength to run with perseverance the race marked out for us. (Hebrews 12:1)

Pray for physical endurance and protection from injuries.

Guided Prayers

Strengthen your spiritual journey with these prayer guides

Pre-Run Prayer

Lord, as I prepare to run, I ask for Your strength and guidance. Help me to focus on You with each step I take.

Endurance Prayer

Grant me the endurance to persevere, not just in this run, but in my spiritual journey. Let each mile strengthen my faith.

Gratitude Prayer

Thank You for the ability to run and move freely. Help me use this gift to glorify You and inspire others.
